original: Majjhima Nikāya 34
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Cūḷagopālakasutta
analyzed: cūḷa gopālaka sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vajjīsu viharati ukkacelāyaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā vajjīsu viharati gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, māgadhako gopālako duppaññajātiko, vassānaṁ pacchime māse
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave māgadhakaḥ gopālakaḥ duppañña jātikaḥ vassānam pacchime māse

original: saradasamaye, asamavekkhitvā gaṅgāya nadiyā orimaṁ tīraṁ, asamavekkhitvā pārimaṁ
analyzed: sarada samaye a samavekkhitvā gaṅgāya nadiyāḥ orimam tīra a samavekkhitvā

original: tīraṁ, atittheneva gāvo patāresi uttaraṁ tīraṁ suvidehānaṁ.
analyzed: tīra atitthena iva gāvaḥ patāresi uttaram tīram

original: Atha kho, bhikkhave, gāvo majjhegaṅgāya nadiyā sote āmaṇḍaliyaṁ karitvā tattheva anayabyasanaṁ āpajjiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhave gāvaḥ majjhegaṅgāya nadiyāḥ sote āmaṇḍaliyam karitvā tattha iva anaya byasanam āpajjisu

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Tathā hi so, bhikkhave, māgadhako gopālako duppaññajātiko, vassānaṁ pacchime māse
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ bhikkhave māgadhakaḥ gopālakaḥ duppañña jātikaḥ vassānam pacchime māse

original: saradasamaye, asamavekkhitvā gaṅgāya nadiyā orimaṁ tīraṁ, asamavekkhitvā pārimaṁ
analyzed: sarada samaye a samavekkhitvā gaṅgāya nadiyāḥ orimam tīra a samavekkhitvā

original: tīraṁ, atittheneva gāvo patāresi uttaraṁ tīraṁ suvidehānaṁ.
analyzed: tīra atitthena iva gāvaḥ patāresi uttaram tīram

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā akusalā imassa lokassa akusalā
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ye hi keci samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā akusalāḥ imassa lokassa akusalā

original: parassa lokassa, akusalā māradheyyassa akusalā amāradheyyassa, akusalā maccudheyyassa
analyzed: parassa lokassa akusalāḥ māradheyyassa akusalāḥ a māradheyyassa akusalāḥ maccudheyyassa

original: akusalā amaccudheyyassa, tesaṁ ye sotabbaṁ saddahātabbaṁ maññissanti, tesaṁ taṁ bhavissati
analyzed: akusalāḥ a maccudheyyassa tesam ye sotabbam saddahātabbam maññissanti tesam tam bhavissati

original: dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
analyzed: dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, māgadhako gopālako sappaññajātiko, vassānaṁ pacchime māse
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave māgadhakaḥ gopālakaḥ sappañña jātikaḥ vassānam pacchime māse

original: saradasamaye, samavekkhitvā gaṅgāya nadiyā orimaṁ tīraṁ, samavekkhitvā pārimaṁ tīraṁ,
analyzed: sarada samaye samavekkhitvā gaṅgāya nadiyāḥ orimam tīra samavekkhitvā pārimam tīra

original: tittheneva gāvo patāresi uttaraṁ tīraṁ suvidehānaṁ.
analyzed: titthena iva gāvaḥ patāresi uttaram tīram

original: So paṭhamaṁ patāresi ye te usabhā gopitaro gopariṇāyakā.
analyzed: saḥ paṭhamam patāresi ye te usabhāḥ go pitaraḥ go pariṇāyakā

original: Te tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamaṁsu.
analyzed: te tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamasu

original: Athāpare patāresi balavagāvo dammagāvo.
analyzed: atha apare patāresi balavagāvaḥ damma gāvaḥ

original: Tepi tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamaṁsu.
analyzed: te api tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamasu

original: Athāpare patāresi vacchatare vacchatariyo.
analyzed: atha apare vacchatare vacchatariyo

original: Tepi tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamaṁsu.
analyzed: te api tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamasu

original: Athāpare patāresi vacchake kisābalake.
analyzed: atha apare vacchake kisābalake

original: Tepi tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamaṁsu.
analyzed: te api tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamasu

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, vacchako taruṇako tāvadeva jātako mātugoravakena vuyhamāno, sopi tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamāsi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave vacchakaḥ taruṇakaḥ tāvat eva jātakaḥ mātu goravakena vuyhamāno saḥ api tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamāsi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Tathā hi so, bhikkhave, māgadhako gopālako sappaññajātiko, vassānaṁ pacchime māse
analyzed: tathā hi saḥ bhikkhave māgadhakaḥ gopālakaḥ sappañña jātikaḥ vassānam pacchime māse

original: saradasamaye, samavekkhitvā gaṅgāya nadiyā orimaṁ tīraṁ, samavekkhitvā pārimaṁ tīraṁ,
analyzed: sarada samaye samavekkhitvā gaṅgāya nadiyāḥ orimam tīra samavekkhitvā pārimam tīra

original: tittheneva gāvo patāresi uttaraṁ tīraṁ suvidehānaṁ.
analyzed: titthena iva gāvaḥ patāresi uttaram tīram

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kusalā imassa lokassa kusalā
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ye hi keci samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā kusalāḥ imassa lokassa kusalā

original: parassa lokassa, kusalā māradheyyassa kusalā amāradheyyassa, kusalā maccudheyyassa
analyzed: parassa lokassa kusalāḥ māradheyyassa kusalāḥ a māradheyyassa kusalāḥ maccudheyyassa

original: kusalā amaccudheyyassa, tesaṁ ye sotabbaṁ saddahātabbaṁ maññissanti, tesaṁ taṁ bhavissati
analyzed: kusalāḥ amaccudheyyassa tesam ye sotabbam saddahātabbam maññissanti tesam tam bhavissati

original: dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāya.
analyzed: dīgharattam hitāya sukhāya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye te usabhā gopitaro gopariṇāyakā te tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamaṁsu;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave ye te usabhāḥ go pitaraḥ go pariṇāyakā te tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamasu

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ye te bhikkhū arahantaḥ khīṇa āsavāḥ vusitavantaḥ kata karaṇīyā

original: ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā, te tiriyaṁ
analyzed: ohita bhārāḥ an uppatta sadatthā parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanā sammad aññā vimuttā te

original: mārassa sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṅgatā.
analyzed: mārassa sotam chetvā sotthinā

original: Seyyathāpi te, bhikkhave, balavagāvo dammagāvo tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamaṁsu;
analyzed: seyyathā api te bhikkhave balavagāvaḥ damma gāvaḥ tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamasu

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ye te bhikkhū pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā

original: opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā, tepi tiriyaṁ mārassa sotaṁ
analyzed: opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinaḥ an āvatti dhammā tasmā lokā te pi tiriyam mārassa sota

original: chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ gamissanti.
analyzed: chetvā sa utthinā pāram gamissanti

original: Seyyathāpi te, bhikkhave, vacchatarā vacchatariyo tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamaṁsu;
analyzed: seyyathā api te bhikkhave vacchatarāḥ vacchatariyaḥ tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamasu

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ye te bhikkhū tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayāḥ

original: tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karissanti, tepi tiriyaṁ
analyzed: tanuttā sakadāgāmino sakideva imam lokam āgantvā dukkha ssantam karissanti te pi tiriya

original: mārassa sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ gamissanti.
analyzed: mārassa sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram gamissanti

original: Seyyathāpi te, bhikkhave, vacchakā kisābalakā tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamaṁsu;
analyzed: seyyathā api te bhikkhave vacchakā kisābalakā tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamasu

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā, tepi tiriyaṁ mārassa sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ gamissanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ye te bhikkhū tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayā sotāpannāḥ a vinipāta dhammāḥ niyatā sambodhi parāyanā te pi tiriyam mārassa sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram gamissanti

original: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, vacchako taruṇako tāvadeva jātako mātugoravakena vuyhamāno tiriyaṁ gaṅgāya sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ agamāsi;
analyzed: seyyathā api saḥ bhikkhave vacchakaḥ taruṇakaḥ tāvat eva jātakaḥ mātu goravakena vuyhamānaḥ tiriyam gaṅgāya sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram agamāsi

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū dhammānusārino saddhānusārino, tepi tiriyaṁ mārassa sotaṁ chetvā sotthinā pāraṁ gamissanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ye te bhikkhū dhamma anusārinaḥ saddhā anusārinaḥ te api tiriyam mārassa sotam chetvā sotthinā pāram gamissanti

original: Ahaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, kusalo imassa lokassa kusalo parassa lokassa, kusalo māradheyyassa
analyzed: aham kho pana bhikkhave kusalaḥ imassa lokassa kusalaḥ parassa lokassa kusalaḥ māradheyyassa

original: kusalo amāradheyyassa, kusalo maccudheyyassa kusalo amaccudheyyassa. Tassa mayhaṁ,
analyzed: kusalaḥ a māra dheyyassa kusalaḥ maccu dheyyassa kusalaḥ a maccu dheyyassa tassa mayha

original: bhikkhave, ye sotabbaṁ saddahātabbaṁ maññissanti, tesaṁ taṁ bhavissati dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhave ye sotabbam saddahātabbam maññissanti tesam tam bhavissati dīgharattam hitāya sukhāya ati

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Idaṁ vatvā sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
analyzed: idam vatvā sugataḥ atha aparam etat avoca satthā

original: “Ayaṁ loko paro loko,
analyzed: ayam lokaḥ paraḥ lokaḥ

original: jānatā suppakāsito;
analyzed: jānatā su pakāsitaḥ

original: Yañca mārena sampattaṁ,
analyzed: yat ca mārena sampatta

original: appattaṁ yañca maccunā.
analyzed: appattam yat ca maccunā

original: Sabbaṁ lokaṁ abhiññāya,
analyzed: sabbam lokam abhiññāya

original: sambuddhena pajānatā;
analyzed: sambuddhena pajānatā

original: Vivaṭaṁ amatadvāraṁ,
analyzed: amatadvāra

original: khemaṁ nibbānapattiyā.
analyzed: khemam nibbāna pattiyā

original: Chinnaṁ pāpimato sotaṁ,
analyzed: chinnam pāpimataḥ sota

original: Viddhastaṁ vinaḷīkataṁ;
analyzed: viddhaḥ tam vinaḍīkata

original: Pāmojjabahulā hotha,
analyzed: pāmojja bahulāḥ

original: Khemaṁ pattattha bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: khemam bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: Cūḷagopālakasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ catutthaṁ.
analyzed: cūḷagopālaka suttam niṭṭhitam catuttha
